attributes.action: Change Leeds United AFC's badge back to the "Rose and ball of the 1990s to signify a new and successful era for the club
attributes.additional_details: I want Leeds United to change the current crest the club wears back to the crest from the 1990s when the club last won the old First Division and was the clubs second golden era. The current crest also lacks history and is associated with the relegation and administration of the club since 2004.
